Title: Symphony Framework
Description: The Symphony Framework is a set of classes and capabilities that are designed to assist the Synergy/DE developer in enhancing the power of Synergy .NET
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Symphony Framework is a set of classes and capabilities that are designed to assist the Synergy/DE developer in enhancing the power of the Synergy .NET development environment and migrate their traditional Synergy/DE applications to a Windows Presentation Foundation desktop user experience.

You can now enrol in the Symphony Framework Academy!  The academy is a new training resource available at www.SymphonyFramework.net with information and self-paced tutorials that will help you to fully utilise the Symphony Framework in your quest to build the next generation of desktop applications.

For full details of the updated components please visit www.SymphonyFramework.net  and click the Release notes tab.

Symphony Framework is now available through NuGet.org
